entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
